leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

unit.unit_name: 空间：配准/解卷积/空间域识别

tools.name: MUSE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for characterizing tissue composition in spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: MUSE (Morphology and transcriptional heterogeneity Unification via Spatial Estimation) is a deep learning approach that characterizes tissue composition by combining morphological and transcriptional information from spatially resolved transcriptomics data.

tools.name: VoltRon
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial omic analysis toolbox for multi-resolution integration
tools.detailed_description: VoltRon is a spatial omic analysis toolbox designed for multi-resolution and multi-omic integration. It utilizes image registration techniques to align and analyze spatial data across different resolutions and modalities.

tools.name: cell2location
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive mapping of tissue cell architecture via spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: cell2location is a Bayesian model for integrating single-cell RNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics data. It maps cell types to spatial locations with high sensitivity and resolution, enabling the study of tissue architecture.

tools.name: SINFONIA
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable identification of spatially variable genes and domains
tools.detailed_description: SINFONIA is a tool for the scalable identification of spatially variable genes and the deciphering of spatial domains in spatial transcriptomics data. It is developed by the BioX Lab at Nankai University.

tools.name: dataset-histology-landmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of landmarks for histology image registration
tools.detailed_description: A dataset containing landmarks specifically designed for the registration of histology images, facilitating the development and benchmarking of image registration algorithms in pathology.

tools.name: cellcharter
tools.one_line_profile: Identification and characterization of spatial clusters from omics data
tools.detailed_description: CellCharter is a Python package for the identification, characterization, and comparison of spatial clusters (niches) from spatial omics data, enabling the analysis of tissue organization.

tools.name: HealthGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Large Vision-Language Model for healthcare tasks
tools.detailed_description: HealthGPT is a Medical Large Vision-Language Model designed to unify comprehension and generation tasks in healthcare via heterogeneous knowledge adaptation. It serves as a foundation model for medical AI applications.

tools.name: segger_dev
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based cell segmentation model for spatial omics
tools.detailed_description: A cutting-edge cell segmentation model specifically designed for single-molecule resolved spatial omics datasets. It leverages Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to accurately segment individual cells in complex imaging datasets.

tools.name: spatialGE
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis of spatially-resolved gene expression
tools.detailed_description: spatialGE is an R package providing methods for the visualization and analysis of spatially-resolved gene expression data, facilitating the exploration of tissue heterogeneity.

tools.name: STalign
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment of spatial transcriptomics data using diffeomorphic metric mapping
tools.detailed_description: STalign is a Python tool for the alignment of spatial transcriptomics (ST) data. It uses diffeomorphic metric mapping to align tissue sections, enabling 3D reconstruction and cross-section analysis.

tools.name: STdeconvolve
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free cell-type deconvolution of spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: STdeconvolve is an R package for the reference-free cell-type deconvolution of multi-cellular spatially resolved transcriptomics data. It infers cell type proportions and transcriptional profiles directly from ST data.

tools.name: geocmeans
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Fuzzy C-means clustering for R
tools.detailed_description: geocmeans is an R package that implements Spatial Fuzzy C-means (SFCM) clustering. It is designed for spatial analysis and pattern recognition in geographic or biological spatial data.

tools.name: DeepST
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for identifying spatial domains in spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: DeepST is a deep learning-based method for identifying spatial domains in spatial transcriptomics data. It integrates spatial location information and gene expression data to accurately partition tissue heterogeneity.

tools.name: DeepTalk
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of cell-cell communication from spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: DeepTalk utilizes a subgraph-based attentional graph neural network to decipher cell-cell communication at single-cell resolution from spatially resolved transcriptomic data.

tools.name: SpatialGlue
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for spatial multi-omics data integration
tools.detailed_description: SpatialGlue is a graph neural network-based tool designed to integrate spatial multi-omics data, enabling the identification of spatial domains and cross-omics interactions with high accuracy.

tools.name: us-non-stationary-deconv
tools.one_line_profile: Physical model for non-stationary blur deconvolution in ultrasound
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of a physical model for handling non-stationary blur in ultrasound imaging, useful for enhancing image quality and resolution in medical physics contexts.

tools.name: SPOTlight
tools.one_line_profile: Deconvolution of spatial transcriptomics spots
tools.detailed_description: SPOTlight is a computational tool that enables the deconvolution of cell types and states within spatial transcriptomics capture locations (spots) by leveraging single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: XeniumSpatialAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for analyzing Xenium spatial gene expression gradients
tools.detailed_description: An R-based toolkit designed specifically for the analysis of Xenium spatial transcriptomics data, focusing on assessing gene expression gradients and spatial patterns.

tools.name: xolotl
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially dependent cluster dynamics simulator for materials science
tools.detailed_description: Xolotl is a high-performance cluster dynamics simulator used to predict the evolution of microstructures in materials, particularly for fusion energy applications, modeling spatially dependent defect interactions.

tools.name: SpatialCTD
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network solution for spatial cell type deconvolution
tools.detailed_description: SpatialCTD provides a large-scale atlas and a Graph Neural Network-based method for deconvolving cell types in spatial transcriptomics data, facilitating the mapping of cell types to spatial locations.

tools.name: STIM
tools.one_line_profile: Library for managing and viewing spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: STIM is a Java library designed for managing, storing, viewing, and processing spatial transcriptomics data, leveraging the Imglib2 and N5 ecosystems for efficient large-scale image handling.

tools.name: STAGATE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph attention auto-encoder for spatial domain identification
tools.detailed_description: STAGATE is an adaptive graph attention auto-encoder designed to identify spatial domains in spatial transcriptomics data by learning low-dimensional latent embeddings that capture spatial dependencies.

tools.name: STAGATE_pyG
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch Geometric implementation of STAGATE
tools.detailed_description: This is the PyTorch Geometric (PyG) implementation of the STAGATE algorithm, offering optimized performance for identifying spatial domains in spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: NeuroGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for precise seizure detection and classification from EEG data using GNNs
tools.detailed_description: NeuroGNN is a framework for seizure detection and classification from EEG data. It employs dynamic Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to capture intricate spatial, temporal, semantic, and taxonomic correlations between EEG electrode locations and brain regions.

tools.name: Redeconve
tools.one_line_profile: Deconvolution of spatial transcriptomics at single-cell resolution
tools.detailed_description: Redeconve is a tool for the deconvolution of spatial transcriptomics data, enabling the resolution of cell type compositions at the single-cell level within spatial spots.

tools.name: ScoMAP
tools.one_line_profile: R package to spatially integrate single-cell omics data into virtual cells
tools.detailed_description: ScoMAP is an R package designed to spatially integrate single-cell omics data into virtual cells and infer enhancer-to-gene relationships, facilitating spatial analysis of gene regulation.

tools.name: stereoscope
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial mapping of cell types by integration of transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: Stereoscope is a probabilistic method for spatial mapping of cell types by integrating single-cell RNA-seq data with spatial transcriptomics data, enabling high-resolution tissue characterization.

tools.name: iSCALE
tools.one_line_profile: Scaling up spatial transcriptomics for large-sized tissues
tools.detailed_description: iSCALE is a tool designed to scale up spatial transcriptomics analysis for large-sized tissues, uncovering cellular-level tissue architecture beyond the limitations of conventional platforms.

tools.name: SPLIT
tools.one_line_profile: Profile purification of single-cell spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: SPLIT is a tool for the profile purification of single-cell spatial transcriptomics data, aiming to improve the accuracy of cell type identification and downstream analysis.

tools.name: Tangram
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial alignment of single cell transcriptomic data
tools.detailed_description: Tangram is a Python library for mapping single-cell gene expression data to spatial transcriptomics data. It aligns single-cell data to spatial grids to infer spatial gene expression patterns.

tools.name: city2graph
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to transform geospatial data into graph representations for GNN analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to transform geospatial relations (road networks, urban structures) into graph representations, facilitating spatial network analysis and the application of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) in urban science.

tools.name: HiSpatialCluster
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance spatial point clustering tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for clustering spatial points using a Fast Search algorithm. It supports high-performance computing via CUDA or CPU parallelism and can be run standalone or integrated with ArcGIS.

tools.name: dbscan
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the DBSCAN clustering algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A standalone Python implementation of the Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise (DBSCAN) algorithm, widely used for unsupervised clustering in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: clusterpy
tools.one_line_profile: Library of spatially constrained clustering algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to spatially constrained clustering algorithms, enabling researchers to identify spatial regions and patterns in geospatial data.

tools.name: ViT-Adapter
tools.one_line_profile: Vision Transformer Adapter for dense prediction tasks
tools.detailed_description: A vision transformer adapter designed to introduce inductive biases into plain ViT for dense prediction tasks such as semantic segmentation and object detection, applicable to scientific image analysis.

tools.name: SpatialEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Instance segmentation via spatial embeddings and clustering
tools.detailed_description: A method for instance segmentation that jointly optimizes spatial embeddings and clustering bandwidth, useful for separating objects in dense scientific imagery.

tools.name: Clustering (osc)
tools.one_line_profile: Orthodromic Spatial Clustering (R package mirror)
tools.detailed_description: A CRAN R package mirror for Orthodromic Spatial Clustering (osc), providing algorithms for spatial clustering of data points based on orthodromic distances.

tools.name: CytoSPACE
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping scRNA-seq data to spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for the optimal mapping of single-cell RNA-seq data to spatial transcriptomics data, enabling high-resolution reconstruction of tissue architecture.

tools.name: BayesSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian clustering and resolution enhancement for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian statistical method for clustering and enhancing the resolution of spatial gene expression experiments, allowing for sub-spot resolution analysis.

tools.name: ST-DBSCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal DBSCAN clustering tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ST-DBSCAN algorithm, designed for clustering data with both spatial and temporal attributes.

tools.name: MaskFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Universal image segmentation architecture
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning architecture for semantic and instance segmentation that treats segmentation as a mask classification problem. Widely applicable to scientific image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: MetaCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of CLIP (Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training) by Meta Research. Useful as a foundation model for multimodal scientific data analysis and embedding generation.

tools.name: VCMeshConv
tools.one_line_profile: Fully convolutional mesh autoencoder for 3D meshes
tools.detailed_description: A non-template-specific fully convolutional mesh autoencoder for registered mesh data, capable of learning latent representations for 3D tasks, applicable to biological or material mesh structures.

tools.name: st_gridnet
tools.one_line_profile: CNN for registration of high-resolution histology images
tools.detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network model developed for the common-coordinate registration of high-resolution histology images, specifically for spatial transcriptomics applications.

tools.name: graphstore
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance in-memory graph structure library
tools.detailed_description: The core graph data structure library powering Gephi, designed for fast in-memory manipulation of large graphs, suitable for network science and complex system analysis.

tools.name: CytoCommunity
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised and supervised discovery of tissue cellular neighborhoods from cell phenotypes
tools.detailed_description: A spatial omics data analysis tool that leverages graph-based learning to identify complex tissue cellular neighborhoods (TCNs) and spatial domains from single-cell spatial data.

tools.name: SpaGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Integrating gene expression, spatial location and histology to identify spatial domains
tools.detailed_description: A graph convolutional network approach that integrates gene expression, spatial location, and histology to identify spatial domains and spatially variable genes (SVGs) in spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: spatialcluster
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially-constrained clustering library for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing spatially-constrained clustering algorithms, useful for identifying spatial domains in geographic or biological spatial data.

tools.name: ppf-registration-spatial-hashing
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated point pair feature registration with spatial hashing
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of point pair feature (PPF) registration using spatial hashing, applicable to 3D structural alignment tasks in robotics and potentially structural biology.

tools.name: SpatialPPIv2
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-protein interaction prediction using GNNs and protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework enhancing protein-protein interaction prediction by combining graph neural networks with protein language models, specifically for spatial context.

tools.name: spacedeconv
tools.one_line_profile: Unified interface for spatial transcriptomics deconvolution methods
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a unified interface to various spatial transcriptomics deconvolution tools, facilitating the estimation of cell type proportions in spatial spots.

tools.name: Tangram (Aviation)
tools.one_line_profile: Modular platform for real-time aviation research and simulation
tools.detailed_description: An open platform designed for modular, real-time aviation research, enabling simulation and analysis of aviation systems.

tools.name: pygephi_graphstreaming
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for streaming graph data to Gephi visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python client enabling real-time graph streaming to Gephi, a standard tool for network analysis and visualization in scientific research.

tools.name: BANKSY
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial clustering algorithm unifying cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation
tools.detailed_description: An R package for spatial clustering that unifies cell type identification and tissue domain segmentation using spatial neighborhood information.

tools.name: BANKSY_py
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the BANKSY spatial clustering algorithm
tools.detailed_description: The Python implementation of the BANKSY algorithm for spatial clustering, enabling cell typing and tissue domain segmentation in spatial transcriptomics.

tools.name: PASTE
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic alignment and integration of spatial transcriptomics slices
tools.detailed_description: A computational method (Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments) for aligning and integrating spatial transcriptomics data across multiple slices.

tools.name: PASTE2
tools.one_line_profile: Improved probabilistic alignment for spatial transcriptomics with partial overlap support
tools.detailed_description: The second version of PASTE, featuring improved algorithms for partial alignment and integration of spatial transcriptomics slices.

tools.name: DeepSpot2Cell
tools.one_line_profile: Predicts single-cell expression from H&E images using spot-level supervision
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting virtual single-cell spatial transcriptomics profiles directly from H&E histology images, utilizing spot-level supervision.

tools.name: iCellR
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for analysis and visualization of single-cell and spatial omics data
tools.detailed_description: An interactive R package for the analysis and visualization of high-throughput single-cell sequencing data (scRNA-seq, scATAC-seq) and Spatial Transcriptomics.

tools.name: GAT-Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for tissue spatial relationship analysis in whole slide images
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining Graph Neural Networks and Mamba architecture to capture local and global tissue spatial relationships in Whole Slide Images (WSI).

tools.name: spotless-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for spatial transcriptomics deconvolution tools
tools.detailed_description: A repository and framework for benchmarking and evaluating the performance of various spatial deconvolution and mapping tools using synthetic and real datasets.

tools.name: SpottedPy
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of hotspot cluster distances in spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for hotspot cluster distance analysis in spatial transcriptomic data, aiding in the understanding of spatial distributions.

tools.name: Celloscope
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic model for marker-gene-driven cell type deconvolution in spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: Celloscope is a probabilistic model designed for marker-gene-driven cell type deconvolution in spatial transcriptomics data, enabling precise mapping of cell types within tissues.

tools.name: SPATA
tools.one_line_profile: R package for spatial gene expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: SPATA is a comprehensive R package designed for the analysis of spatial gene expression data, providing tools for visualization, trajectory analysis, and spatial pattern recognition.

tools.name: deconvATAC
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomics deconvolution for chromatin accessibility data
tools.detailed_description: A method demonstrating that spatial transcriptomics deconvolution techniques can generalize to spatial chromatin accessibility data, enabling multi-modal spatial analysis.

tools.name: spatial_atlas_ssl
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised learning for mask inpainting on large spatial atlases
tools.detailed_description: A self-supervised learning framework designed for mask inpainting on large-scale spatial atlases, such as the BICCN 2.0 data, to handle missing data and improve atlas quality.

tools.name: automatic-histology-registration-pyimagej
tools.one_line_profile: Automated registration of histological images using PyImageJ
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the registration of histological images by leveraging stitching and registration plugins in FIJI via PyImageJ, facilitating automated image alignment workflows.

tools.name: ClusterMap
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale clustering analysis of spatial gene expression
tools.detailed_description: ClusterMap is a tool designed for multi-scale clustering analysis of spatial gene expression data, enabling the identification of biologically meaningful spatial domains and patterns.

tools.name: SpaBatch
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-slice integration and 3D spatial domain identification
tools.detailed_description: SpaBatch is a deep learning-based tool for cross-slice integration and 3D spatial domain identification in spatial transcriptomics, addressing batch effects and enabling 3D reconstruction.

tools.name: SpaDAMA
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-Adversarial Masked Autoencoder for cell type deconvolution in spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model leveraging domain-adversarial training and masked autoencoders to perform cell type deconvolution on spatial transcriptomics data, addressing domain shift issues.

tools.name: SpatialCVGAE
tools.one_line_profile: Variational graph autoencoder framework for spatial transcriptomics clustering and embedding
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing multiple variational graph autoencoders with consensus clustering to generate low-dimensional embeddings and identify spatial domains in spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: CODA
tools.one_line_profile: Unified toolkit for spatial transcriptomics alignment, domain detection, and differential analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool designed for spatial transcriptomics that performs nonlinear alignment, identifies common spatial domains, and conducts spatial differential gene analysis.

tools.name: CCST
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network model for cell clustering in spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A method for cell clustering in spatial transcriptomics data that leverages graph neural networks to capture spatial dependencies and expression patterns.

tools.name: gcnn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph convolutional neural network for classifying building patterns from spatial vector data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model applied to urban science/GIS for classifying building patterns using spatial vector data and graph convolutional networks.

tools.name: SpatialCOC
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal integration framework for spatial multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: A framework (referenced as SpaKnit in description) for integrating spatial multi-omics data to uncover spatial heterogeneity and cross-modal interactions.

tools.name: MNMST
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-layer network model for identifying spatial domains in spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A multi-layer network approach to identify spatial domains and patterns from spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: SpaSEG
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised CNN-based model for spatial domain identification and SVG detection
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised convolutional neural network model designed for multiple spatial transcriptomics tasks, including spatial domain identification, section integration, and spatially variable gene detection.

tools.name: STAIG
tools.one_line_profile: Image-aided graph contrastive learning framework for spatial transcriptomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A method utilizing image-aided graph contrastive learning for deciphering spatial patterns and performing alignment-free integration of spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: SakePP
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Attention Kinetic Graph Neural Network for quantifying protein-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network model incorporating spatial attention mechanisms to quantify and predict protein-protein interactions.

tools.name: BrainAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for whole-brain spatial transcriptomics alignment between human and mouse
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed to align whole-brain spatial transcriptomics data across species (human and mouse) to facilitate comparative analysis.

tools.name: STAligner
tools.one_line_profile: Graph attention autoencoder-based tool for alignment and integration of spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the alignment and integration of spatially resolved transcriptomics data, enabling the construction of 3D tissue structures or comparison across sections.
